Title: Aav Taru Kari Nakhu
Actors: Monal Gajjar, Manisha Kanojia, Aditya Kapadia, Tiku Talsania
Plot: A stoic father falls in love and ends up marrying his college sweetheart whose sons are incidentally in love with both of her daughters. The sons then hilariously attempt ways to try and sabotage their father's marriage.
